decoworld.model.world.combat.events

Interface HealthListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedMob, EliteMob

    public interface HealthListener
    Objects that need to respond to a health event should implement this interface. Call the method addHealthListener() on an object that implements HasHealth to receive health events relating to it.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onHealthEvent(HealthEvent event) 

    • Method Detail

      • onHealthEvent
